wikipedia_page.main: Alexander McDonald (5 November 1937 – 17 March 2016) was a Scottish minister of the Church of Scotland who served as the Moderator of the General Assembly of the Church of Scotland from 1997 to 1998.

response: * Sandy McDonald (1937–2016), Scottish Minister of the Church of Scotland
Sandy McDonald, also MacDonald or Macdonald, may refer to:
* Sandy McDonald (Alexander McDonald, 1937–2016), a Scottish minister
* Sandy McDonald (Alexander McDonald, 1937–2016), Church of Scotland minister
